org.apache.zookeeper.metrics

Interface Counter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleCounter

    public interface Counter
    A counter refers to a value which can only increase. Usually the value is reset when the process starts.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(long delta)
      Increment the value by a given amount.
      long get()
      Get the current value held by the counter.
      default void inc()
      Increment the value by one.

    • Method Detail

      • inc

        default void inc()
        Increment the value by one.

        This method is thread safe, The MetricsProvider will take care of synchronization.

      • add

        void add(long delta)
        Increment the value by a given amount.

        This method is thread safe, The MetricsProvider will take care of synchronization.

        Parameters:
        delta - amount to increment, this cannot be a negative number.

      • get

        long get()
        Get the current value held by the counter.

        This method is thread safe, The MetricsProvider will take care of synchronization.

        Returns:
        the current value
